serial
mpicxx heat_serial.cpp -o heat_serial.out
srun -A proj_1593 heat_serial.out

parallel
mpicxx heat_parallel.cpp -o heat_parallel.out
srun -N 1 --ntasks-per-node=4 -A proj_1593 heat_mpi.out
rank: 0
